param.name: selectedroot
param.label: Selected subcategory to root
param.description: If you select a menuitem, and you also select from it's submenuitems, then you can make the submenuitems to be first level items too. (This would be the obvious behaviour, but it needs extra codes, that is why this option was made.)

param.name: displaynum
param.label: Display submenu count
param.description: You can show the number of all submenus inside the category. This includes all lower level subcategory. This is how many actual subcategories are, not just how much do you make our menu show, in case you are using the 'selected subcategory to root' option.

param.name: menuicons
param.label: Menu_icons
param.description: You can show the chosen image of your category next to it's name.
